mechanic: Soul Shards - Salvage enemy wrecks for parts

cards.name: Soul Harvest
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage. If this destroys an enemy, gain 3 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Reduced from 4 damage to 3. No lifesteal. Rewards killing blows with Shard generation.

cards.name: Bone Scythe Swing
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage. Basic Ossuarium attack.
cards.design_notes: Reduced from 4 damage to 3. Removed lifesteal entirely. Just a basic attack now.

cards.name: Death Grasp
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage at range.
cards.design_notes: Reduced from 3 damage to 2. Removed lifesteal. Now just a ranged poke.

cards.name: Siphon Essence
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. If this destroys an enemy, gain 2 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Kept at 2 damage. Removed lifesteal, added Shard generation on kill.

cards.name: Necrotic Touch
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. If this destroys an enemy, gain 4 Soul Shards (double reward).
cards.design_notes: Kept at 2 damage. Execution bonus now grants extra Shards instead of healing.

cards.name: Soul Rend
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage. On kill, gain 3 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Reduced from 5 damage to 4. Removed lifesteal, added Shard generation on kill.

cards.name: Drain Life
cards.effect: Deal 5 damage at long range. On kill, gain 4 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Reduced from 6 damage to 5. Removed massive lifesteal, added substantial Shard reward on kill.

cards.name: Bone Scythe Reap
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage to primary target and 2 damage to all adjacent enemies. For each enemy destroyed, gain 2 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Kept AoE pattern. Removed lifesteal per target, added Shard generation per kill.

cards.name: Corpse Explosion
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage to target hex and all adjacent hexes.
cards.design_notes: Kept at 3 AoE damage. Removed lifesteal entirely. Just damage now.

cards.name: Salvage Protocol
cards.effect: Spend 3 Soul Shards to recover 3 cards. Gain 2 Taint.
cards.design_notes: NEW CARD. Core Ossuarium mechanic. Standard salvage action.

cards.name: Emergency Rebuild
cards.effect: Spend 5 Soul Shards to recover 5 cards. Gain 3 Taint.
cards.design_notes: NEW CARD. Desperate big heal. High Taint cost.

cards.name: Corpse Fuel
cards.effect: Passive: Whenever an enemy is destroyed within 3 hexes, gain 2 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Changed from auto-heal to Shard generation. Rewards killing near you.

cards.name: Death Mark
cards.effect: Mark target enemy. When the marked enemy is destroyed, gain +2 bonus Soul Shards. Lasts until enemy dies or you mark a different target.
cards.design_notes: Changed from recovery bonus to Shard generation bonus. Focus fire reward.

cards.name: Grave Pact
cards.effect: Discard 3 cards. Deal 6 damage (2 damage per card discarded). If this destroys an enemy, gain 4 Soul Shards.
cards.design_notes: Kept sacrifice mechanic. Removed delayed recovery, added Shard reward on kill.

cards.name: Scavenge Wreckage
cards.effect: Target a destroyed enemy wreck within 4 hexes. Gain 3 Soul Shards. That wreck is removed (cannot be scavenged again).
cards.design_notes: NEW CARD. Allows scavenging wrecks post-battle for extra Shards.

cards.name: Reanimate
cards.effect: Spend 3 Soul Shards. Summon a Skeletal Minion within 3 hexes (3 HP, 3 Movement, 2 melee damage). Minion acts after your turn.
cards.design_notes: Now costs Soul Shards to summon. Creates minion from salvaged parts.

cards.name: Phylactery
cards.effect: Passive: The first time you would be reduced to 0 HP, if you have 5+ Soul Shards, spend 5 Shards to recover to 3 HP. Gain 5 Taint. Once per mission.
cards.design_notes: No longer free. Requires 5 Shards and gives massive Taint penalty. Desperate last resort.

cards.name: Deathless Advance
cards.effect: Move up to 3 hexes. Until end of turn, you cannot take more than 5 damage from any single attack (damage cap).
cards.design_notes: Unchanged. No lifesteal component to remove. Defensive mobility option.

cards.name: Bone Armor
cards.effect: Reactive: When attacked, reduce damage by 2.
cards.design_notes: Removed conditional lifesteal. Now just a simple damage reduction.

cards.name: Corpse Shield
cards.effect: Passive: When an enemy within 3 hexes is destroyed, gain +3 Defense until end of your next turn.
cards.design_notes: Unchanged. No lifesteal component. Defensive bonus from nearby kills.

cards.name: Taint Purge
cards.effect: Discard 4 cards. Remove up to 4 Taint. You cannot spend Soul Shards this turn.
cards.design_notes: NEW CARD. Only way to remove Taint. Extremely costly - must sacrifice cards and can't salvage same turn.

removed_cards.name: Necrotic Surge
removed_cards.reason: Multiplicative healing amplifier. No longer fits without lifesteal.

removed_cards.name: Vampiric Rune
removed_cards.reason: Conditional healing bonus. No longer fits without lifesteal.

removed_cards.name: Soul Well
removed_cards.reason: Free passive healing. Removes decision-making. Against design philosophy.

removed_cards.name: Death Shroud
removed_cards.reason: Healing amplifier. No longer relevant without lifesteal.
